Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

PUBLIC

 

Dear Hani,

 

Thank you for patiently bearing with us.

 

We have received the policy details from our UW team and registered this claim under reference 13/FA/2013302. 

 

Having reviewed the survey report, we understand from the Loss Adjuster that the repair cost quoted by our insured's recommended contractor is overstated. The assigned loss adjuster requested the original installation cost to support, but this was never provided. 
MS IDC Interiors General Contractors, an independent professional contractor, was then appointed and provided a competitive proposal (see attached). Our insured is allowed to choose any contractor they want to use, however please keep in mind that our maximum obligation will be the amount quoted by IDC.

 

In view of the above, we are now pleased to offer the below:

Damaged stock:                                                KWD 720.69

Repairs to Fixtures and Fittings:                 KWD 5,020.00

Gross Loss:                                                          KWD 5,740.69

Less Excess (10% of claim amount):          KWD 574.07 

Net Settlement:                                                KWD 5,166.62 / AED 61,772.02

 

Please request the insured to proceed with the repairs and provide us with the repair receipt.

	From: Group Security Control Room <GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> >
	Date: 17 January 2024 at 7:32:37 am GMT+3
	To: Louay Saab <Louay.Saab@chalhoub.com <mailto:Louay.Saab@chalhoub.com> >, Emmanuel Mbalaseki <Emmanuel.Mbalaseki@chalhoub.com <mailto:Emmanuel.Mbalaseki@chalhoub.com> >
	Cc: Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com> >, Philip Abdou <Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> >, Ahmed Eltahan <Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> >, Hasna Raissi <Hasna.Raissi@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hasna.Raissi@chalhoub.com> >
	Subject: FACES AL-Khairan (Water leakage)

	﻿ 

	Dear Louay & Emmanuel,

	Good morning,

	 

	In response to the request from the Mr. Louay, we reviewed CCTV cameras for FACES AL-KHAIRAN Kuwait and found that there was water leakage in the store floor from the ceiling at 02:31hrs and ended at 02:54hrs, 

	 

	Kindly find the attached snapshots for reference.

	 

	 

	Regards 

	Group security Control Room.

Subject: RE: Insured: FACES General Trading (Chalhoub) / AL-Khairan Mall (Kuwait) - Water Leakage - Insurer: GIG - Nasco Claim# TBA || 13/FA/2013302

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

PUBLIC

 

Dear Hani,

 

Thank you for patiently bearing with us.

 

We have received the policy details from our UW team and registered this claim under reference 13/FA/2013302. 

 

Having reviewed the survey report, we understand from the Loss Adjuster that the repair cost quoted by our insured's recommended contractor is overstated. The assigned loss adjuster requested the original installation cost to support, but this was never provided. 
MS IDC Interiors General Contractors, an independent professional contractor, was then appointed and provided a competitive proposal (see attached). Our insured is allowed to choose any contractor they want to use, however please keep in mind that our maximum obligation will be the amount quoted by IDC.

 

In view of the above, we are now pleased to offer the below:

Damaged stock:                                                KWD 720.69

Repairs to Fixtures and Fittings:                 KWD 5,020.00

Gross Loss:                                                          KWD 5,740.69

Less Excess (10% of claim amount):          KWD 574.07 

Net Settlement:                                                KWD 5,166.62 / AED 61,772.02

 

Please request the insured to proceed with the repairs and provide us with the repair receipt.

	To: Louay Saab <Louay.Saab@chalhoub.com <mailto:Louay.Saab@chalhoub.com> >, Emmanuel Mbalaseki <Emmanuel.Mbalaseki@chalhoub.com <mailto:Emmanuel.Mbalaseki@chalhoub.com> >
	Cc: Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com> >, Philip Abdou <Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> >, Ahmed Eltahan <Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> >, Hasna Raissi <Hasna.Raissi@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hasna.Raissi@chalhoub.com> >
	Subject: FACES AL-Khairan (Water leakage)

	﻿ 

	Dear Louay & Emmanuel,

	Good morning,

	 

	In response to the request from the Mr. Louay, we reviewed CCTV cameras for FACES AL-KHAIRAN Kuwait and found that there was water leakage in the store floor from the ceiling at 02:31hrs and ended at 02:54hrs, 

	 

	Kindly find the attached snapshots for reference.

	 

	 

	Regards 

	Group security Control Room.

Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

PUBLIC

 

Dear Hani,

 

Thank you for patiently bearing with us.

 

We have received the policy details from our UW team and registered this claim under reference 13/FA/2013302. 

 

Having reviewed the survey report, we understand from the Loss Adjuster that the repair cost quoted by our insured's recommended contractor is overstated. The assigned loss adjuster requested the original installation cost to support, but this was never provided. 
MS IDC Interiors General Contractors, an independent professional contractor, was then appointed and provided a competitive proposal (see attached). Our insured is allowed to choose any contractor they want to use, however please keep in mind that our maximum obligation will be the amount quoted by IDC.

 

In view of the above, we are now pleased to offer the below:

Damaged stock:                                                KWD 720.69

Repairs to Fixtures and Fittings:                 KWD 5,020.00

Gross Loss:                                                          KWD 5,740.69

Less Excess (10% of claim amount):          KWD 574.07 

Net Settlement:                                                KWD 5,166.62 / AED 61,772.02

 

Please request the insured to proceed with the repairs and provide us with the repair receipt.

	From: Group Security Control Room <GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> >
	Date: 17 January 2024 at 7:32:37 am GMT+3
	To: Louay Saab <Louay.Saab@chalhoub.com <mailto:Louay.Saab@chalhoub.com> >, Emmanuel Mbalaseki <Emmanuel.Mbalaseki@chalhoub.com <mailto:Emmanuel.Mbalaseki@chalhoub.com> >
	Cc: Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com> >, Philip Abdou <Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> >, Ahmed Eltahan <Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> >, Hasna Raissi <Hasna.Raissi@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hasna.Raissi@chalhoub.com> >
	Subject: FACES AL-Khairan (Water leakage)

	﻿ 

	Dear Louay & Emmanuel,

	Good morning,

	 

	In response to the request from the Mr. Louay, we reviewed CCTV cameras for FACES AL-KHAIRAN Kuwait and found that there was water leakage in the store floor from the ceiling at 02:31hrs and ended at 02:54hrs, 

	 

	Kindly find the attached snapshots for reference.

	 

	 

	Regards 

	Group security Control Room.
